mapper.select: select resName, postcode, roadAddress, jibunAddress, extraAddress, detailAddress, email from residence_view

select parkingName, parkingType, place, p.resName, r.roadAddress, r.jibunAddress, r.detailAddress, p.regDate, m.name, parkingChk from parking_view p, residence_view r, member_view m where p.resName = r.resName and m.email = r.email

select m.name, parkingName, parkingType, place, min30Fee, addMin10Fee, manageTime, r.postcode, r.roadAddress, r.jibunAddress, r.detailAddress, r.extraAddress, p.aptMap, p.parkingPic, r.lat, r.lng from parking_view p, residence_view r, member_view m where p.resName = r.resName and m.email = r.email and parkingName = #{parkingName}
select PARKINGPIC, PARKINGNAME, DAYTIME, WEETIME, HOLTIME, place from PARKING

select parkingName, parkingType, min30Fee, addMin10Fee, roadAddress, extraAddress, manageTime, place, parkingPic, lat, lng from parking_view p, residence_view r where p.resName = r.resName and parkingChk = 'Y'
